Screenshot of a character interaction with the main menu highlighted and a callout box. The callout box says "The main menu will allow you to perform various functions within the simulation: Visit a Contact – switch between contacts and hold a conversation with them; Review Documents – review bank documents that you have received during the simulation; Conversation History – review the conversations that you've had with various contacts; Interface Help – open a PDF to review how to use the simulation interface (just as you are doing right now)."
